column3:
The workaround I've used is:

```
brew link openssl --force
```
The force linking is also a good idea, though, I think if we detect brews OpenSSL pkgconf, we should also allow to detect the headers in brews OpenSSL path. \n
I think [this](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew/blob/master/share/doc/homebrew/How-to-build-software-outside-Homebrew-with-Homebrew-keg-only-dependencies.md) is how you would do that properly.\n
@jameshilliard I think this PR would do it exactly as recommended in you link.\n
Doesn't it need $(brew --prefix) in the include path for keg only openssl?\n
@theuni can you take a look here?\n
Cannot reproduce the issue anymore. It was probably a local-only thing.\nThanks @theuni!\n
